2:
I pour out my lament before him;
\q I tell him my troubles.
3:
When my spirit is weak within me,
\q you know my path.
\q In the way that I walk
\q they have hidden a trap for me.
\q
4:
I look to my right and and see
\q that there is no one who cares about me.
\q There is no escape for me;
\q no one cares about my life.
\q
6:
Listen to my call,
\q for I have been brought very low;
\q rescue me from my persecutors,
\q for they are stronger than I.
\q
7:
Bring my soul out of prison
\q so that I may give thanks to your name.
\q The righteous will gather around me
\q because you have been good to me."
142:
\m
\d A maschil of David, when he was in the cave; a prayer.
\q
